name: debian
install_commands: RUN echo "deb http://archive.debian.com/debian/ RELEASE contrib main non-free" | cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list
RUN echo "deb http://archive.debian.com/debian/ RELEASE RELEASE-unstable contrib main non-free" | cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list
RUN echo "deb http://archive.debian.org/debian-non-US/ RELEASE/non-US main contrib non-free" | cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list
RUN echo "deb-src http://archive.debian.org/debian-non-US/ RELEASE/non-US main contrib non-free" | cat >> /etc/apt/sources.list
# Exit 0 non manda tutto il circo in errore
